DOC.brief_summary: Diabetic macular edema common complication ocular diabetes mellitus cause blindness . VEGF responsible proliferation , extension increase permeability vessel . The aim study examine short-term effect intravitreal bevacizumab ( Avastin® 1.25 mg 0.05 ml ) triamcinolone visual acuity central retinal thickness patient clinically significant diabetic macular edema ( CSME ) .
DOC.brief_title: Short-term Effects Intravitreal Bevacizumab Triamcinolone Patients With Diabetic Macular Edema
